item.title: "Foundation Stone Soon for Gadwal Court Complex: Advocates and Public Debate Site Feasibility".
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal : A new court complex is set to be constructed along the Gadwal-Kurnool road. On Sunday, MLA Krishna Mohan Reddy, Bar Association President Raghu Rami Reddy, Secretary Shafiullah, and advocates Manohar, Sridhar, Rajasekhar Reddy, Manzoor, Patel Prabhakar Reddy, and Mansur inspected the site.
After discussions with District Collector Santosh Kumar, the MLA and advocates finalized the location, emphasizing that there were no vested interests in the land allotment process by the previous go...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
